sql_query: SELECT o.order_id, o.product, o.amount, u.name, u.age FROM "orders" o JOIN "u1" u ON o.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.product, o.amount, u.name, u.age FROM "orders" AS o LEFT JOIN "u1" AS u ON o.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT u.name AS user_name, u.status AS user_status, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM u1 u LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.name, u.status

SELECT usr.name AS user_name, usr.status AS user_status, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM u1 usr LEFT JOIN orders o ON usr.user_id = o.user_id WHERE usr.status IN ('active','pending') GROUP BY usr.name, usr.status
SELECT usr.name AS user_name, usr.status AS user_status, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM u1 usr LEFT JOIN orders o ON usr.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY user_name, user_status

test_name: Inner join with subquery for total orders
sql_query: SELECT u1.name, u1.status, o.amount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders ) AS total_orders FROM u1 JOIN orders o ON u1.user_id = o.user_id

test_name: Right join with subquery for total orders
sql_query: SELECT u1.name, u1.status, o.amount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders ) AS total_orders FROM u1 RIGHT JOIN orders o ON u1.user_id = o.user_id

test_name: Union query: Select amount from orders and age from u1
sql_query: SELECT amount FROM "orders" UNION SELECT age FROM "u1"

test_name: Error count query: Users without orders
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM u1 usr LEFT JOIN orders o ON usr.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_id IS NULL
WITH total AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM orders) SELECT u1.name, u1.status, o.amount, total.total_count AS total_orders FROM u1 JOIN orders o ON u1.user_id = o.user_id CROSS JOIN total

test_name: INTERSECT query: Common user_ids in both streams
sql_query: SELECT user_id FROM "u1" INTERSECT SELECT user_id FROM "orders"
SELECT user_id FROM "u1" EXCEPT SELECT user_id FROM "orders"

test_name: INTERSECT with WHERE clause: Active users with orders
sql_query: SELECT user_id FROM "u1" WHERE status = 'active' INTERSECT SELECT user_id FROM "orders"

test_name: EXCEPT with multiple columns: Users details without orders
sql_query: SELECT user_id, name FROM "u1" EXCEPT SELECT user_id, 'placeholder' FROM "orders"
